importante: IMPORTANT: If any of the diners have any food intolerance or allergy, please indicate it when selecting the date, in the Observations section. If not indicated in advance and it is a fixed menu, we do not guarantee the possibility of adaptation.
horario:
Dining service hours: from 14:00 to 17:00*
* As it is a training space and due to the students' schedule, the entry of diners to the practice dining room will be allowed until 15:00 and closing will be at 17:00.

Some service days may vary depending on the students' training calendar.
menu:
Reservations can be made for a maximum of 8 diners per table.
The menus will be published on this page approximately one week in advance and may undergo slight changes due to last-minute adjustments.
inicio_titulo: Murcia School of Hospitality and Tourism 'La Flota'
inicio_saludo: The mission of the school is to provide our students with excellent theoretical and practical training in the hospitality and food sector, both in management aspects and product elaboration, all focused on achieving the job placement of our students.
anular_reserva1: If you wish to cancel the reservation, click
recordar_reserva: If you don't remember the reservation number, click
recordar_reserva3: enter your email and you will receive a new email
